Introducing Copilot - Carvana's ownership companion that provides customers with the easiest way complete their purchase, make their payments and track their warranties.

In this release, we've improved our loan servicing capabilities and delivery tracker.

In this release, we've improved our loan servicing capabilities and delivery tracker.

Introducing Copilot - Carvana's ownership companion that provides customers with the easiest way complete their purchase, make their payments and track their warranties.

In this release, we made various bug fixes and improvements.

Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Updated appraisal process to sell or trade-in your vehicle
- Pre-order vehicles that are coming soon and get updated as your new car is reconditioned and photographed.
- Improved checkout flow, making it even easier to link your bank and get verified
- Bug fixes throughout the app for the absolute best Carvana experience

- Updated appraisal process to sell or trade-in your vehicle
- Pre-order vehicles that are coming soon and get updated as your new car is reconditioned and photographed.
- Improved checkout flow, making it even easier to link your bank and get verified
- Bug fixes throughout the app for the absolute best Carvana experience

Tons of new features to make it easier than ever to find and buy the car you’ll love!

- Refreshed search results view with new inventory-type labeling
- Improved appraisal process to sell or trade-in your vehicle
- Faster and easier checkout
- Share your new car with friends in one-click
- Download your temporary registration or license plate
- Bug fixes throughout for the absolute best Carvana experience

Tons of new features to make it easier than ever to find and buy the car you’ll love!

- Bug fixes throughout for the absolute best Carvana experience
